name: Candy Cacao Star
description:
Candy Cacao Star is a very popular match -3 game
Start to find and get the shinning candy stars! Solve all the puzzles and try to get three stars in each level! Have fun in this sweetest adventure!
Features:
- Sweet and delicious candies!
- Small size but stunning effects
- Many unique levels to make game more fun
- Simple to start but hard to fully master
